name: Grilled Mushroom and Swiss
author: Rachel Staloch
summary: A great variation of the classic grilled cheese sandwich.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat, and cook and stir mushrooms and spinach until mushrooms are tender and spinach is wilted, about 3 minutes
Season to taste with salt and pepper; set aside
Spread one side of each bread slice with butter
Place one bread slice, buttered side down, into the skillet
Top with the Swiss cheese, then spread the mushroom mixture on top of the cheese
Cover with the second slice of bread, buttered side up
Cook until the sandwich is golden brown on both sides, turning once
Cut in half and serve hot
